message.entry: Invalid dimension of keypoint colors. Keypoint colors must be a M-by-1 or M-by-3 matrix, where M is the number of keypoints corresponding to an object.
Invalid dimension of keypoint labels. Keypoint labels must be a M-by-1 array, where M is the number of keypoints corresponding to an object.
Spatial dimensions of keypoint visibility argument must correspond to spatial and channel dimensions of keypoints.
Keypoint visibility must be a logical matrix.
The number of planes in input image must be fixed.
Keypoint size must be a positive scalar
Keypoint labels must be either categorical array or string vector.
